name: Negative Space (itch) (FocusNIL, alien236, Chem13, Spriter Theo)
name_original: Negative Space (itch) (FocusNIL, alien236, Chem13, Spriter Theo)
description:
Negative Space

Have you always wanted to play as a robot saving the future of humanity by restoring power to a damaged spaceship? Us either, but it was the best we could do on such short notice. Sue us. (That was sarcasm. Please don't sue us.) In this fun rotating platform game, you help a crusty robot named Rusty (or R-66Y, but only his friends call him that, and he doesn’t have any) collect powerups to solve puzzles and avoid getting crushed or falling to his death.

Input device: keyboard

Controls
Arrow Keys/WASD - Move
N - Rotate Left
M - Rotate Right
SPACE - Use Power

Credits
Level design: Scott Rose, Autumn Slade, Christopher Nicholson
Coding: Theoden Swaby, Scott Rose, Autumn Slade
Music: Autumn Slade
Story/Text: Christopher Nicholson
Sprites: Theoden Swaby, Autumn Slade
Cover Art: Autumn Slade

Sound Effects Taken from freesound.org by Christopher Nicholson, except “Hallelujah” created by Autumn Slade, based on a composition by George Frideric Handel (may he rest in peace)
Cartoony Clangs (hit with spade)_2 – Timbre
Electricity – deleted_user_7146007
Futuristic Alarm – EminYILDIRIM
Laser – Daleonfire
Short Servo Burst 1 – Speedenza
Spaceship Cruising, UFO – BurghRecords
SuccessFanfareTrumpets – FunWithSound

Font from https://www.dafont.com/yuji-adachi.d308

Contact sites: theodenswaby.com
christopherrandallnicholson.com
